data.trans: Sự đối lập, sự mâu thuẫn
data.trans_hint: Chủ đề của cuốn sách là sự mâu thuẫn giữa tình yêu và trách nhiệm.
data.en_hint: The book's theme is the conflict between love and duty.
data.content_game_1: The book's theme is the conflict between love and duty.
data.answer_en_hint: The book's theme is the conflict between love and duty.

data.trans: Tính thanh lịch, tính tao nhã
data.trans_hint: Bài viết của ông kết hợp sự thanh lịch và hóm hỉnh.
data.en_hint: His writing combines elegance and wit.
data.content_game_1: His writing combines elegance and wit.
data.answer_en_hint: His writing combines elegance and wit.

data.trans: Nghệ sĩ biểu diễn giải trí
data.trans_hint: Một nghệ sĩ đường phố đang trình diễn ca khúc yêu thích của tôi ở góc đường.
data.en_hint: A street entertainer is performing my favorite song at the corner of the road.
data.content_game_1: A street entertainer is performing my favorite song at the corner of the road.
data.answer_en_hint: A street entertainer is performing my favorite song at the corner of the road.

data.trans_hint: Cô ấy có vẻ rất nhiệt tình với ý tưởng cho sản phẩm âm nhạc mới.
data.en_hint: She seems to be very enthusiastic about the idea for new music production.
data.content_game_1: She seems to be very enthusiastic about the idea for new music production.
data.answer_en_hint: She seems to be very enthusiastic about the idea for new music production.

data.trans_hint: Các nhà sưu tập thích khám phá các cửa hàng đồ cổ để tìm kiếm các món hời.
data.en_hint: The collector likes to explore antique shops looking for bargains.
data.content_game_1: The collector likes to explore antique shops looking for bargains.
data.answer_en_hint: The collector likes to explore antique shops looking for bargains.

data.trans: Nghề làm vườn, sự trồng vườn
data.trans_hint: Khi nghỉ hưu, bà đã có thể đắm chìm với sở thích làm vườn, hát hợp xướng và làm đồ gỗ.
data.en_hint: In retirement, she was able to indulge in her hobbies of gardening, choral singing, and woodwork.
data.content_game_1: In retirement, she was able to indulge in her hobbies of gardening, choral singing, and woodwork.
data.answer_en_hint: In retirement, she was able to indulge in her hobbies of gardening, choral singing, and woodwork.

data.trans_hint: Người phụ nữ bắt đầu vẽ tranh lúc nghỉ hưu, khi cô ấy có nhiều thời gian rảnh rỗi hơn.
data.en_hint: The woman took up painting in her retirement, when she had more leisure time.
data.content_game_1: The woman took up painting in her retirement, when she had more leisure time.
data.answer_en_hint: The woman took up painting in her retirement, when she had more leisure time.

data.trans_hint: Mái tóc đỏ và vóc dáng thấp của nam diễn viên khiến anh dễ nhận ra.
data.en_hint: The actor's red hair and short stature made him easy to recognize.
data.content_game_1: The actor's red hair and short stature made him easy to recognize.
data.answer_en_hint: The actor's red hair and short stature made him easy to recognize.

data.trans_hint: Các đánh giá trong cuốn sách hướng dẫn này rất chủ quan, nhưng đọc cũng thú vị.
data.en_hint: The reviews in this guidebook are highly subjective, but fun to read.
data.content_game_1: The reviews in this guidebook are highly subjective, but fun to read.
data.answer_en_hint: The reviews in this guidebook are highly subjective, but fun to read.

data.trans_hint: Học viện phải giữ sự khách quan hoàn toàn để quyết định các giải thưởng.
data.en_hint: The Academy had to remain completely objective in order to decide the awards.
data.content_game_1: The Academy had to remain completely objective in order to decide the awards.
data.answer_en_hint: The Academy had to remain completely objective in order to decide the awards.

data.trans_hint: Những màn trình diễn xuất sắc của cô đã tạo ra một chuẩn mực mới cho các ca sĩ trên toàn thế giới.
data.en_hint: Her outstanding performances set a new benchmark for singers throughout the world.
